intro: Isotrema yachangense, commonly known as the Yachangense Isotrema, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers and hairy leaves. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
